HostFav’s datacenter has network redundancy, power redundancy and interruption-free maintenance.

* WHMCS’s Proxmox Module
* LXC Containers with Proxmox

### Advanced Features:
* Backup
* Snapshot (KVM Only)
* Firewall Rules
